name: Mary Anne Charity Trust (MACT)
briefDescription: MARY ANNE CHARITY TRUST (MACT) is a non profit, non governmental voluntary organization working with an integrated community development initiative in a multi faceted social work approach aimed at self sustainability of the underprivileged. Started in the year 1996 registered under the Indian Trust Act in the Rural village of Trichy district is spread over to Pudhukottai, Thiruvallur, Kancheepuram and to the City of Chennai working for the basic human rights of the underprivileged
